PARAGRAPH.STRING: in Utah, USA is one of the most prominent and recognizable mountains viewable from practically every location in the Salt Lake Valley. Although not the tallest peak along the Wasatch front,
is a popular hiking destination for locals.
is situated immediately East of the center of the Salt Lake Valley (due East from Murray and Taylorsville). The highest outcropping on
, dubbed "Summit Peak," towers above the valley to an elevation of 9026 ft. Thus, the peak looms about 4800 ft above the valley floor.
